word:
I am your friend, and as such I write to you. I will send this letter to you today, and will write more fully as soon as I can. But this will give you something to work on. You can be a blessing to your wife, and she can be a blessing to you.--Letter 157, 1903. (July 26, 1903.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. March 31, 1983
